Method Detail

register

public Input.Registration register(Input.Region region,
                                   Mouse.Listener listener)
Configures a reaction to be notified of mouse activity. On mouse activity, reactions will be scanned from most-recently-registered to least-recently-registered and hit-tested. Thus more recently registered reactions that overlap previously registered reactions will take precedence. TODO: use layer depth information to hit test based on depth.

Mouse motion events are dispatched to the region over which the mouse is hovering, if any (with overlapping regions resolved as described above). After a mouse down, subsequent movement, up and wheel events will be dispatched to the reaction that successfully hit-tested the mouse start. In the absence of an active down reaction, mouse wheel events are dispatched to the region over which the mouse is hovering, if any.

Specified by:
register in class Input<Mouse.Listener>
Returns:
a handle that can be used to clear this registration.
